speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: You have reached the end of this guided tour. You now possess the foundational knowledge to direct all three creative engines, manage complex scenes, and produce high-quality audio.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: Remember that A I is a creative partner. The best results often come from experimentation. Do not be afraid to try unusual descriptions or instructions.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: If you ever need a refresher, the new Help Guide is available from the link in the top-left of the main window. It contains a full text version of everything we have discussed.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: The world of audio is now yours to create. This studio is merely a set of tools; the vision is yours alone.

speaker: Tutorial Wizard
text: Thank you for joining me. Happy directing!
